name: Bess Lomax Hawes
description: '''Bess Lomax Hawes''' (January 21, 1921 – November 27, 2009) was an American [[folk music]]ian, [[folklorist]], and researcher. She was the daughter of [[John Lomax|John Avery Lomax]] and Bess Bauman-Brown Lomax, and the sister of [[Alan Lomax]] and [[John Lomax Jr.]]
